description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Mighty Tiger Gaming and WST in the KPL Growth League Group Stage, scheduled for January 31 at 6:45AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Mighty Tiger Gaming" if Mighty Tiger Gaming wins 3 or more games than WST in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "WST".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Mighty Tiger Gaming and WST in the KPL Growth League Group Stage, scheduled for January 31 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Mighty Tiger Gaming" if Mighty Tiger Gaming win the match against WST.

This market will resolve to "WST" if WST win the match against Mighty Tiger Gaming.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/honorofkings/Main_Page.
events.title: Honor of Kings: Mighty Tiger Gaming vs WST (BO5) - KPL Growth League Group Stage

question: Game Handicap: MTG (-2.5) vs WST (+2.5)
